alert.note: Alert for Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Coleman and northeastern Runnels Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Talpa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coleman, Winters, Santa Anna, Novice, Glen Cove, Benoit, Voss, Silver Valley, Crews, Valera, Talpa, Hatchel, Echo, Mozelle, Lake Winters Lake, Fisk, Shields and Hords Creek Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Texas.
